title: Understanding Linear Equations with Algebra Tiles: Integrating the Balance Method in Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and simple equation structures
context.additional_context: Job-Integrated Mathematics Education Program for Adult Learners. Mathematical Thinking Training is Required to Strengthen Decision-Making Abilities as Managers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physical balance principles of linear equations using algebra tiles.
Learners can solve linear equations within three steps with 80% accuracy by applying the balancing method.
Learners can visually and symbolically transform equation-solving processes using virtual algebra tile tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
